text: Naho utamubonye (uwo mucakara ngo amubohore), agomba gusiba amezi abiri akurikiranye mbere y’uko yongera kubonana (n’umugore we), ariko utabishoboye, agomba kugaburira abakene mirongo itandatu. Ibyo ni ukugira ngo mwemere Allah n’Intumwa ye. Izo ni imbago zashyizweho na Allah, kandi abahakanyi bazahanishwa ibihano bibabaza
